[
    Expression(
        SemicolonTerminated {
            inner: Variable(
                VariableVariable(
                    VariableVariable {
                        span: Span(
                            1,
                            7,
                        ),
                        variable: SimpleVariable(
                            SimpleVariable {
                                span: Span(
                                    1,
                                    8,
                                ),
                                name: "a",
                            },
                        ),
                    },
                ),
            ),
            semicolon: Span(
                1,
                10,
            ),
        },
    ),
]
